attributes.review: So obviously I had very high hopes for this app. I expected quality content, as President Trump consistently does such great work (that was sarcasm). But would you look at that! Turns out this app is total crap. Useless, disgusting, infuriating, poorly designed, bland interface. Much like President Trump, this app is a complete waste of time and resources, and I believe it should be removed.
